name: kolibri-explore-plugin
description: Monorepo with kolibri's Discovery page and custom channel presentations.

scripts.build: yarn build:version && yarn build:packages && yarn deploy:welcome && yarn build:plugin && yarn build:info
scripts.build:i18n: yarn run i18n-extract && yarn run i18n-django-compilemessages
scripts.build-dist: ./scripts/clean.sh && yarn clean && yarn build && python -m build
scripts.i18n-extract-backend: cd kolibri_explore_plugin && python -m kolibri manage makemessages --skip-update -l en --ignore 'node_modules/*' --ignore 'kolibri_explore_plugin/dist/*'
scripts.i18n-extract: yarn run i18n-extract-frontend && yarn run i18n-extract-backend
scripts.i18n-django-compilemessages: cd kolibri_explore_plugin && PYTHONPATH="..:$$PYTHONPATH" python -m kolibri manage compilemessages --skip-update
scripts.i18n-download-translations: kolibri-tools i18n-code-gen --output-dir ./kolibri_explore_plugin/assets/src --lang-info ./kolibri_explore_plugin/locale/language_info.json && yarn run i18n-django-compilemessages && yarn exec kolibri-tools i18n-create-message-files -- $npm_package_config_kolibri_tools_i18n_modules
